note:
Had been part of Indian Government owned Media for over three decades till recently. Now I run my own web magazine raagdelhi.com. Also write independently. Political views - Liberal in Gandhian-socialist mould. Apart from Gandhi, consider Dr Ram Manohar Lohia and Dr B R Ambedkar as my ideals. Strongly believe in values enshrined in the Indian Constitution - Liberty, Equality, Fraternity.
Confused about economic policies my country should adopt. Welfarism seems must.
